alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:54PM EDT until July 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles north of Madawaska to near Eagle Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Fort Kent, Madawaska, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Frenchville, New Canada, Lille, Madawaska Lake, Cross Lake, Wallagrass, Grand Isle, Stockholm, Hamlin, Sinclair, Daigle, Guerette, Soldier Pond, Saint Agatha, Cyr Plantation and Saint John. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
